page.title: 14VILLAGE HALL
page.content: In Langford Budville there has never been a village hall. There was a working mans club that had to close down because there was not enough money to keep it going. A new hall is needed because of the lack of facilities within the parish. It will be built on a site at The Three Ashes. It will cost about Â£13,500 and Â£6,500 still has to be raised. There is a fund raising committee of twenty people and the children have helped to raise a lot of money as well. The events which are organized to raise money are Bingo evenings, Fetes, sponsored skittles, walks and Charity Queen contest. The new village hall will be used for different clubs for adults and children, parish meetings, dances, discos and many other events.
